attributes.action: bring pressure to bear (on our behalf) on The Chief of the Defence Staff and The Secretary for Defence to re-submit a recommendation to the H D Committee to issue a Campaign Medal to all members of Bomber Command in WW2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After a long campaign The Bevin Boys and the Land Army were given an award, and now there is a growing demand from an angry public for Bomber Command to be awarded a Campaign Medal. 

125,000 aircrew carried out 366,514 sorties ( 297,663 by night) and during these operations 55,573 pilots and crew were killed, the largest loss of life in any of the services.

This petition is on behalf of all 125,000 members of Bomber Command who deserve a CAMPAIGN MEDAL as a mark of respect for their endeavour, outstanding bravery and sacrifice of lives that saved our country and preserved our freedom.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
